name: AniDub Online player clearing
description:
Delete playlist and playlist buttons from it.

If disabling all "display: none" then it will keep them, but move in a side.

user.name: XCanG
user.about: Like black backgrounds and white text. Changed Windows theme like this, changed and changing websites to look like my theme. You can download it here for Windows 7 (may be work on 8 and 10, because I don't use Aero)
